name: Residence Inn Tucson Speedway

reviews.text: I enjoyed my weeklong stay at this hotel. It has nice areas outside for gathering, if you can handle the arizona heat. The rooms were nice with lots of room and the small kitchen was great. I will defininely stay here again!
reviews.title: Nice hotel

reviews.text: The Residence Inn is Tucson is very cute. Its made up of little townhouses. 2 units upstairs and 2 down. It was so welcome to not have too many neighbors. The property offers a breakfast buffet and snacks at night which I skipped. They have great laundry facilites with 5 washers and 6 driers! My room had a full kitchen with all the fixings so I was ready to cook as soon as I went grocery shopping (a service they do for you for free if you want). There is even a Trader Joes in the neighborhood! My room had a fireplace (which they sell logs for in the lobby). All in all everything about my stay was great except for the bed. It was so lumpy I couldnt sleep at night. I ended up camping out on the couch where I was much more comfortable.
reviews.title: Great property, lumpy bed

aka: Residence Inn Tucson Speedway Hotel Tucson
